But ____ seems ____ many ____ them ____ too ____ fixed ____ the ____ to ____ removed. Their power and financial influence proved to be too difficult to overcome.

But i_ seems th__ many o_ them we__ too dee___ fixed i_ the sys___ to b_ removed. Their power and financial influence proved to be too difficult to overcome.
data.fullContent: The issue with corruption in the city council has not been improved by the most recent elections. People were determined to get the most corrupt politicians out of power. But it seems that many of them were too deeply fixed in the system to be removed. Their power and financial influence proved to be too difficult to overcome.
data.answer: 最近的选举并没有改善市议会的腐败问题。人们决心要把最腐败的政客赶下台。但似乎其中许多都深深扎根于体系之中，无法被移除。事实证明，他们的权力和金融影响力难以克服。
